main.PluginASPCode: <% function RandomArticle(ByVal action) Dim blog_RandomArticle Dim Random_rs,Random_sql TempVar="" '========================================= '打开数据库操作 Randomize Set Random_sql=Conn.Execute("SELECT top 10 C.*,L.cate_ID,L.cate_Secret FROM blog_Content AS C,blog_Category AS L where L.cate_ID=C.log_CateID and L.cate_Secret=false and C.log_IsDraft=false orDER BY rnd(-(C.log_ID+" & rnd() & "))") SQLQueryNums=SQLQueryNums+1 TempVar="" Do While Not Random_sql.EOF if Random_sql("cate_Secret") then blog_RandomArticle=blog_RandomArticle&TempVar&Random_sql("log_ID")&"|,|"&Random_sql("log_Author")&"|,|"&Random_sql("log_PostTime")&"|,|"&"[隐藏分类日志]" elseif Random_sql("log_IsShow") then blog_RandomArticle=blog_RandomArticle&TempVar&Random_sql("log_ID")&"|,|"&Random_sql("log_Author")&"|,|"&Random_sql("log_PostTime")&"|,|"&Random_sql("log_title") else blog_RandomArticle=blog_RandomArticle&TempVar&Random_sql("log_ID")&"|,|"&Random_sql("log_Author")&"|,|"&Random_sql("log_PostTime")&"|,|"&"[隐藏日志]" end if TempVar="|$|" Random_sql.MoveNext Loop Set Random_sql=Nothing blog_RandomArticle=Split(blog_RandomArticle,"|$|") if action<>2 then dim Random_Items,Random_Item,urlLink For Each Random_Items IN blog_RandomArticle Random_Item=Split(Random_Items,"|,|") if blog_postFile = 2 then urlLink = "article/"&Random_Item(0)&".htm" else urlLink = "article.asp?id="&Random_Item(0) end if RandomArticle=RandomArticle&""&CCEncode(CutStr(Random_Item(3),25))&"" Next end if end function '处理随机日志内容 Dim Random_code if Session(CookieName&"_LastDo")="DelArticle" or Session(CookieName&"_LastDo")="AddArticle" or Session(CookieName&"_LastDo")="EditArticle" then RandomArticle(2) Random_code=RandomArticle(0) side_html_default=replace(side_html_default,"<$RandomLog$>",Random_code) side_html=replace(side_html,"<$RandomLog$>",Random_code) %>
